for the peeps with control issues as far as not being able to change in game settings if you have a gamepad or something get xpadder you can define a games controlls to your gamepad example ones that do not normally have these little features. now as far as some people having vid issues or whatever make sure to read the "note" in torrent description. if that is the issue than instead of just complaining and not helping with it give your system specs like windows 7 x64 with ati 5xxx gfx card. that is an example. this makes it much easier to determine if it is a rip issue or a system issue.

You have to just create a folder in the main directory named "UI" and then move the "movies" folder in it.
If you cannot get the game to full screen, then try hitting Alt+F4 as soon as the game launches.
